data.text: @MollyJongFast Hey, go shoot that Cat 5 Hurricane. Make yourself useful.
@MovieHood thank You Karen! We Dodged a Bullet! No Damage... Small Debris etc.... We All Have Hurricane Hangover Tho!!! Slow Moving Storm Made for Some Long Days!! 🙏🏻
@Only1Easton Hurricane vacation lol

data.text: @bigchaslappa You are a strange sister you know this? But miss you too, hope you enjoy not being in the hurricane

data.text:
@rhondagross504 Hey Rhonda!! We’ve been Busy Busy Busy prepping for Hurricane Dorian! Under Mandatory Evacuation So Most Family, Friends, and Neighbors have Left Town! I have to Stay but at Least I have a Permit to Leave for work and re-enter! 

We’re Locking Everything Down!

data.text:
@Lizardofolds Hello Neighbor!🌞

Hurricane Season is Just an Accepted Component of Our Part of the World!

Be Prepped! Be Smart! Be Safe!
And Enjoy the Show! Then Pick Up the Pieces and Do It Again!

Happy Friday y'all! Preparing for a hurricane ⛈️and reflecting on the many storms we face on a daily basis. I couldn't image facing those storms without Jesus as my source of strength 💪hope 😏 and love ❤️.… https://t.co/Z2uzyNzwi0

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis

data.text: @mimikalista It’s Hurricane Season!! Busy Prepping at Work and Home! Looks Scary for South/Central Florida!! I expect a LOT of Rain for Us! Thank You!!!✌️😎✌️

@Larkawuffin @RazrSkarr so in a nutshell releasing a nuke into a hurricane really wouldn't do anything because the amount of power the hurricanes produce is exponentially greater than what a nuclear warhead could potentially do. Thanks for coming to my TED talk
@thally_tica Hurricane party ?
@emilychaanel Come over to my house! We can have a hurricane party 😂
I haven’t even been here for a month and I’m already dodging a hurricane .

tweets.text: @DawgfishJ Glad you are safe, Dorian passed my area late Wednesday afternoon. Can't wait for Sept to be over and done.🌴
